summary: Removes the annoying \"thud\" sneak attack sound.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ywhtm.png[/img][/url][/center]

Removes the annoying \"Thud\" sound when you perform sneak attacks. Sneak attacks should be silent and shouldn\'t scare the S#~T out of you. If you agree, download this mod and enjoy silent kills.

I tested it with marksman and one-handed blade attacks. Worked so far!

Installation: Extract the ESP file to Skyrim/Data folder

Disclaimer: Use it wherever you like, but mention my name.
author: dagincourt88
